amendment.description: To improve the cyber workforce and establish cyber challenges.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2178 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2178 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Wicker to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4188) To improve the cyber workforce and establish cyber challenges.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2178 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
